name: League DAO
description: League DAO is combining the best of DeFi protocols, play-to-earn gaming, and NFTs to create a web3 fantasy gaming reality where users can own and trade the players on their team and where on-chain scoring is based on real-world stats. Users can have a say in protocol governance with its native LEAG token.

en.name: League DAO
en.description: League DAO is combining the best of DeFi protocols, play-to-earn gaming, and NFTs to create a web3 fantasy gaming reality where users can own and trade the players on their team and where on-chain scoring is based on real-world stats. Users can have a say in protocol governance with its native LEAG token.

fr.name: League DAO
fr.description: League DAO combine le meilleur des protocoles DeFi, des jeux play-to-earn et des NFT pour créer un jeu fantastique et réel Web3 où les utilisateurs peuvent posséder et échanger les joueurs de leur équipe et où le score on-chain est basé sur des statistiques du monde réel . Les utilisateurs peuvent participer à la gouvernance du protocole par le biais du jeton natif LEAG.

es.name: League DAO
es.description: League DAO combina lo mejor de los protocolos DeFi, juegos de jugar para ganar y NFT para crear una realidad de juegos de fantasía web3 donde los usuarios pueden poseer e intercambiar a los jugadores de su equipo y donde la puntuación en cadena se basa en estadísticas del mundo real. . Los usuarios pueden opinar sobre la gobernanza del protocolo con su token nativo LEAG.

de.name: League DAO
de.description: League DAO kombiniert das Beste aus DeFi-Protokollen, Spielen um zu gewinnen Gaming und NFTs, um eine Web3-Fantasy-Gaming-Realität zu schaffen, in der Nutzer die Spieler ihres Teams besitzen und handeln können und in der die Wertung auf der Kette auf realen Statistiken basiert. Mit dem LEAG-Token können die Nutzer die Protokollführung mitbestimmen.

pt.name: League DAO
pt.description: League DAO está combinando o melhor dos protocolos DeFi, dos jogos play-to-earn e NFTs, para criar uma realidade de jogo de fantasia web3, onde os usuários podem possuir e negociar com os jogadores de sua equipe, e onde o placar na rede é baseado em estatísticas do mundo real. Usuários podem ter voz ativa na governança do protocolo com seu token nativo LEAG.

el.name: League DAO
el.description: League DAO is combining the best of DeFi protocols, play-to-earn gaming, and NFTs to create a web3 fantasy gaming reality where users can own and trade the players on their team and where on-chain scoring is based on real-world stats. Users can have a say in protocol governance with its native LEAG token.

tr.name: League DAO
tr.description: League DAO, kullanıcıların takımlarındaki oyunculara sahip olabileceği ve bunları takas edebileceği ve zincirleme puanlamanın gerçek dünya istatistiklerine dayandığı bir web3 fantezi oyun gerçekliği oluşturmak için en iyi DeFi protokollerini, kazan-kazan oyunları ve NFT'leri bir araya getiriyor. Kullanıcılar, yerel LEAG belirteci ile protokol yönetiminde söz sahibi olabilir.

vi.name: League DAO
vi.description: League DAO is combining the best of DeFi protocols, play-to-earn gaming, and NFTs to create a web3 fantasy gaming reality where users can own and trade the players on their team and where on-chain scoring is based on real-world stats. Users can have a say in protocol governance with its native LEAG token.

zh.name: League DAO
zh.description: League DAO 集合了 DeFi 协议，玩中赚链游和 NFT 的优点来创建一个 web3 虚幻游戏。用户可以真正拥有并交易自己球队的球员，链上评分都是基于真实世界的统计数据。League DAO 是由 LEAG 持有者管理的。

hi.name: League DAO
hi.description: League DAO एक Web3 फैंतसी गेमिंग वास्तविकता बनाने के लिए सर्वश्रेष्ठ DeFi प्रोटोकॉल, प्ले-टू-अर्न गेमिंग और NFT का संयोजन कर रहा है जहां उपयोगकर्ता अपनी टीम में खिलाड़ियों का स्वामित्व और व्यापार कर सकते हैं और जहां ऑन-चेन स्कोरिंग वास्तविक दुनिया के आंकड़ों पर आधारित है। . उपयोगकर्ता अपने मूल LEAG टोकन के साथ प्रोटोकॉल शासन में अपनी बात रख सकते हैं।
